title: PSA for people who want to "Learn their champ" in my PvP games
body:
There's literally bot games for that, sweaty. 
I don't care if Ornn just came out and you want to try him.
I don't care if you think you're the next Boxbox or some other idiot E-celeb.
I don't care if you're trying out a free rotation champion and it's your first time.

If you're not here to play your very best and win, you're basically wasting my time.
Don't give me that "IT'S JUST NORMALS BRAH" or "IT'S JUST A GAME BRAH" nonsense.
You know better than to hop into a PvP game only to feed your brains out and ruin 4 other people's games, let alone mine.

{{champion:67}}  main, signing out.
